titles.title: NRCS Wetland Compliance and Appeals Reform Act
NRCS Wetland Compliance and Appeals Reform Act
A bill to require reforms to programs of the Natural Resources Conservation Service, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
NRCS Wetland Compliance and Appeals Reform Act
This bill revises provisions related to the Natural Resources Conservation Service of the Department of Agriculture (USDA), including by requiring USDA to establish oversight committees in each state that will oversee the appeals of wetland determinations.
